amendments.title: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 113-47 to ensure that excess funds are used to reduce the annual Federal budget deficit.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Collins (GA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

amendments.title: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 113-47 to ensure the continued supply of helium for end users while requiring the Bureau of Land Management (BLM) to honor existing contracts for the supply and delivery of helium. The amendment affirms that the federal government will honor existing contracts that are set to expire October 1, 2015.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Dent amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 87 - 312 (Roll no. 126).

amendments.title: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 113-47 to consider the long-term future of the Federal Helium Reserve by requiring an assessment of how closing the Federal Helium Reserve could influence helium availability, including options for insuring a reliable helium supply in coming decades.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Holt amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

amendments.title: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 113-47 to affirm the authority of the Secretary of the Interior to allow private entities to connect to and store helium in the Federal Helium Reserve for an appropriate fee.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

amendments.title: In the nature of a substitute.
amendments.latest_major_action: Amendment SA 1960 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
